item.title: Bullet Pattern Generation - Circles, Arcs, and Spirals
item.description: How great danmaku patterns aren't hand-placed; they're mathematical functions. A walkthrough of a single algorithm, evolved from a point on a circle into spiraling, fractal barrages.
